reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Say hello to cleaner air in your home!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This air purifier has a sleek and modern design and its compact size makes it easy to place in various locations. The build quality is sturdy, and the controls are user-friendly.It can clean the air in rooms up to 400 square feet, making it suitable for bedrooms, living rooms, and even small offices.The purifier does an great job of removing allergens, pet dander, and odors, leaving the air feeling noticeably fresher.The inclusion of a timer and sleep mode adds to the overall convenience of this product. The timer allows you to set the device to run for a specified duration, helping you save on energy consumption. The sleep mode reduces the fan speed and noise level, making sure you have a peaceful night's sleep without compromising air quality.The filter is easy to replace, and the unit comes with a filter replacement indicator to ensure your air remains clean and fresh.Overall this air purifier is a reliable, effective and affordable solution for improving indoor air quality. Greatly recommend!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It's quiet and it began clearing the air immediately
reviews.reviewText: Quiet and works greatHas a timer and different levels low med and highWell made worth the price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars The Power Plug is inside the unit!
reviews.reviewText: Lots of reviews say they didn’t get a power cable as I thought the same. You must unlock the bottom panel by twisting back and forth repeatedly because the hinge is stuck on pretty good. Inside, you will find the filter wrapped in plastic and the power cord. Take off the plastic, install the filter and plug in the chord to an outlet.Works great! I feel like the air is more crisp

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: My first impression was the machine has a sleek and compact design. I really like the look of this machine. The set up was quick and easy, less than 3 minutes for me total. The only part that was a challenge was the bottom was stuck and did not want to remove at first. I tried twisting it to unlock, but it would not budge for me. I had my husband remove it and had it set up and running quickly. The controls are easy to figure out for programing. I tried out all of the settings and really like the blue light feature. I left it running from this morning to this evening and noticed the difference in the air already. The air is clean and fresh. I like the option of the timer, but will leave it running as the fan does not disturb me, it actually reminds me of white noise which I enjoy and find soothing. Overall, I love the look, the customizable options and how quickly it cleaned the air in my room. Two thumbs up!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Dangerous Smoking/flammable and missing cable- REFUND
reviews.reviewText: When I opened the package, there was no charging cable that was supposed to come with the device. And to make it worse, when I tried pressing the ON button on the top, the machine started to spew a bit of smoke and a small fire lit. I fortunately blew it out but I am not using this machine. What an unsatisfactory and dangerous purchase. I will check the manual if there’s a warranty so I may return it but regardless, I expect a REFUND.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Arrived Quickly & Was An Incredible Value (Power Cord Is Included!)
reviews.reviewText: This air purifier arrived very quickly and was an incredible value! It is the perfect size for our bedroom night stand and was not too loud at all on the medium setting. Perfect for helping to keep the air clean for my wife and the included essential oil sponge was a great bonus that my wife already had a use for.BTW I don't know what the other reviewer was talking about when he or she said there was no power cable included. Unless they legitimately did not have a power cable included, the power cable is stored inside the unit and you have to open up the unit and remove the plastic from the filter before you can use the air purifier for first use. After you do that you will find the power cord.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Unnecessary, loud button tone.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love the size. And the filter actually makes the difference. I believe it works well. What seriously ruins it in my opinion is the incredibly loud high pitch tone it makes when you touch a button (even in the “sleep” mode. Which makes the fact it turns its light off totally pointless because the beep is what will be disturbing you. It’s really loud, especially in the midst of the night. It’s a shame I’m gonna return this over the “BEEP” alone but…. (Update) two weeks laterSo I decided too keep it because the return is a hassle. And this air purifier has overheated and melted. I don keep it on constant only during night time while I sleep and today I woke up to a plastic smell and seen this thing had melted itself inside and on top. This is a serious safety issue I’m lucky the thing didn’t burn my house down while I slept.
Muy bueno, sería excelente si se pudieran apagar las luces de los botones por la noche. Pero en general el producto hace su trabajo
